Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. Centered on his friendship with a thief accused of theft, the film takes place at the beginning of the Showa period when Japan suffered from economic depression. For Chicago’s summer Hearthfire Festival , I got to see this docu-drama style film here in J-town.
